title: Some serious micellaneous questions for Riot, please answer =C
body:
1. So when does rank resets happen?? This week?? Which is my guess. I think it's sometime this month, but not sure.

2. Also, my other guess is that rank resets will happen in Patch 5.1. So is the next patch coming 4.22 or are we starting 5.1 next??

3. I didn't get my Snowdown Blade icon. =c Let me find the match I should've got it in.... Found it. http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1682792566/41138796?tab=overview I won the match with the Earnest Elf Tristana skin. or does that not count as a Snowdown skin?? Do I need to use a 2014 Snowdown skin to get the icon??

Hmmm...I thought there was a couple more questions I had. Guess not. Oh. I had one about punishment for breaking a certain rule, but I'm too lazy to deal with that again and to explain it all. So I guess I'll save that for another time. I mainly just want these 3 answered. Thanks for answering if you do. =3

replies.body: Sorry, just saw the message.  You already have the icon.  You probably need to scroll through your icons to see it, because sometimes they aren't at the top.
Oh, snap. It actually got answered. Here, take my +1.  Question though. Do you know when rank resets happen, or could maybe ask someone who would know??
Wouldn't be until the new season starts.  That should be posted on the news page when they are ready to announce it.

I knew it was when new season but wasn't sure when that was. I guess they haven't decided when yet.

and wtf, some random person downvoted our comments lol

^

Took me 3 days before I realized I had received that icon.
